medium-questions_key2: A water Tank can be filled in 7 hours by equal sized pumps working together.How much time will 7 pumps take to fill up?
medium-questions_key3: 15 masons can build the wall in 20 days. How many mansons will build the wall in 12 days?
medium-questions_key4: 76 persons can complete the job in 42 days.in how many days will 56 persons do the same job?
medium-questions_key5: In a camp,there are provisions for 400 persons for 23 days. Id 60 more persons join the camp,find the number of days the provision will fast?
medium-questions_key6: If 10 workers,working for 4 hours complete the work in 12 days. In how many days will 8 workers working for 6 hours complete the same work?
medium-questions_key7: The freight for 75 quintals of goods is Rs. 375. Find the freight for 42 quintals.
medium-questions_key8: A car travels 228 km in 3 hours?(a) How long will it take to travel 912 km?(b) How far will it travel in 7 hours?
medium-questions_key9: The cost of 9 liters of petrol is $ 378. How much will 15 litres of petrol cost?
medium-questions_key10: The salary of 12 workers is $ 3732.what will be the salary of 5 workers?
medium-questions_key11: 2 school bags cost $ 276.find the cost of 88 such bags.
